author: Patti Domm
description: Prices at the pump this Memorial Day weekend are among the lowest in years, thanks to low oil prices and near-record-high-refining volumes.
title: Shale drillers gift to Memorial Day drivers—some of the cheapest gasoline in years

author: Sophie Caronello
description: Hitting the road this holiday weekend? You’re not alone. Automobile travel is expected to increase 2.4 percent over the Memorial Day weekend (May 25-29) from 2016, with 34.6 million Americans planning a road trip, according to AAA. And while pump prices are up slightly from last year at this time, U.S. drivers will enjoy the second-cheapest gasoline since 2005.
title: Clogged Roads But Cheap Gas Await Memorial Day Drivers
